name: sketches
description: -   [canvas-sketch](https://github.com/mattdesl/canvas-sketch) is a loose collection of tools, modules and ressources for creating generative art in JavaScript and the browser using `<canvas>` tag. it is designed to help create artworks and images with code, randomness, algorithms and emergent systems. -   it exports high-resolution PNG or Gicl√©e prints, render image sequences to GIF and MP4 loops, generates SVG files for mechanical pen plotters, automatically git hash your artworks for long-term archiving, and much more. -   these tools can be used on their own, or can be combined with your favourite graphics library like ThreeJS, P5.js, D3, etc.
